title-group.article-title: Pricing Stock and Bond Options when the Default-Free Rate is Stochastic: A Comment

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1991 Graduate School of Business Administration, University of Washington

abstract.p: This paper corrects the bond option formula presented by R. Rabinovitch ((1989), Equation (10)). With just one state variable driving the economy, the formula should be the same as the ones presented by Jamshidian (1989) and Chaplin (1987).
